page.title: 13LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: In my spare time on Monday nights I go swimming so does my brother. In my Mum's spare time she goes to stoolball practice on Wednesday and on Thursdays my Mum plays a game of stoolball against a different team. On Fridays my Dad goes down the pub and on Saturdays my brother goes to football practice and on Sunday he plays a game of football. My Mum goes up and plays stoolball to get away from us for a little while. My brother plays football because he enjoys it. I go swimming because I enjoy it. My Dad goes down the pub on Friday because he meets his friends down there and he has a drink with them.
